name: Dark Chocolate Fondue

ingredients.notes: Strawberries, bananas, etc. for additional dipping

instructions.action: Chop dark chocolate into small pieces for easier melting
Heat cream in a double boiler or microwave-safe bowl until warm (not boiling)
Add chopped chocolate to warm cream and stir until completely melted and smooth
Add vanilla extract and sea salt, mix well
Transfer to a fondue pot or serving bowl
Arrange Deri dates and fresh fruits on a platter
Dip and enjoy immediately while chocolate is warm

tips: Use high-quality dark chocolate for best flavor
Keep fondue warm with a tea light candle underneath
If chocolate thickens, add a splash of warm cream
Can add a tablespoon of liqueur for adult version
Perfect for parties and special occasions
